message.body: Grandpa, you good?
I've been better, I've been worse. How's Texas Marf?
Texas was hot, but new ulm's beautiful. I'll tell you how Philly is in a week. I had a worried feeling about you. I hope things iron out for you.
Your espn is impressive.
Golden auras, Luke... Let me know if there's anything i can do.
Damn Marf, that's nice of you. Thank you.
Have you ever seen Parks and Recreation?
I saw and liked the same episode twice on two different flights
I really appreciate that you care about me. Do you know how hard that is to find in another person? And have it be real and genuine?
Virtually
Impossible
I dont know about that. Maybe we just have a hard time expressing it or acknowledging it. But I'm sorry you feel like that, Luke
Asking someone " how is your heart?". Fucking seriously Martha. It's the sweetest thing anyone has ever asked me.
Is there a specific reason why you're feeling this way? Did somebody fuck with you bc I'll mess them up....
The only other people in my life that ask me stuff like that are my sister and sometimes my grandma. And I want you to know how much it means to me when you do
No. It was brought on by you asking me if I was ok out of nowhere
And i believe you legitimately care
Whereas most people ask out of duty. And only when it's convenient for them
Well im glad to hear youre fine. But the offer still stands... And I do care! But it doesn't deserve too much fanfare, grandpa. You're easy to care about.
In my life anyway
